page.title: 20Local Government
page.content: Our Domesday area is in the Highland Region,which is the largest Region in Scotland.Our Regional Councillors are Mr David Martin,who lives in Inverness and Mr Hamish Fraser of Conon Bridge.The Regional Council Headquarters are in Inverness.The district of the Region in which we live is Ross and Cromarty and our District Councillers are Mr Eric Simpson of Strathpeffer and Mr Hamish Fraser who also serves on the Distict Council.Both villages of Maryburgh and Conon Bridge have Community Councils made up from residents of the two villages who deal with local affairs.Our Member of Parliament is Mr Charles Kennedy who is a member of the Social Democratic Party.Mrs Winnie Ewing of the Scottish National Party is our representative in the European Parliament.
